SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.Configuration

Class ConfigurationManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.Networking.Client.Configuration.ConfigurationManager
public class ConfigurationManager extends Object
This class is used for managing configurations. It is responsible for saving, retrieving and deleting configurations from disk. Configurations are store in JSON files

  • Constructor Details

    • ConfigurationManager

      public ConfigurationManager()

  • Method Details

    • saveConfiguration

      public static void saveConfiguration(Configuration configuration) throws RuntimeException
      This method save a Configuration on disk in a JSON format. The name of the file is the player name.
      Parameters:
      configuration - the Configuration to save on disk
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if file cannot be created or an IOException occurs while performing the action

    • retrieveConfiguration

      public static Configuration retrieveConfiguration(String nick) throws IllegalStateException, IOException
      This method retrieves a configuration from disk, loading it from file with name equals to nick.
      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname of the player owning the configuration file
      Returns:
      the Configuration read from file
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the configuration does not exist on the path
      IOException - if an error occurs while performing the requested action

    • retrieveConfiguration

      public static List<Configuration> retrieveConfiguration() throws IllegalStateException
      This method is used to retrieve a configuration from disk. It works if and only if in the specified path (ClientSettings.CONFIG_FILE_PATH) there is only one file, otherwise an IllegalStateException is raised.
      Returns:
      the Configuration read from file
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if JSON file is corrupted or there is more then one file in the path ClientSettings.CONFIG_FILE_PATH

    • deleteConfiguration

      public static void deleteConfiguration(String nick)
      This method deletes the configuration file with name equals to nick>.
      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname of the player for which it is necessary to delete its configuration file
